content: You don’t really need any equipment for camping
The first step to failure is trying.
It's never too late to start again, until it is.
It's never too early to go back to bed.
Hospitality staff will lose respect for you if you tip.
You don’t need an electrician, just do it yourself.
If you set low expectations you won't be disappointed.
If you're ever bored, just see what's in the fridge.
Every day is another chance to screw everything up again.
The best things in life cost the most.
